title: Canadian doctor once posted to Beijing ignored by Ottawa after offering help with COVID-19 response - The Globe and Mail
description: A few days after the Jan. 23 lockdown of Wuhan, Felix Li sent an e-mail to the Public Health Agency of Canada offering his expertise. ‘I offered to go back to Ottawa to work with them on this. I needed to help, to save lives,’ Dr. Li said in an interview
content:
Public Health Agency of Canada has relied heavily on the World Health Organization for information and guidance in its response to the rapid spread of the deadly new virus.
Denis Balibouse/Reuters
For seven years, Felix Li served on the distant front lines … [+6542 chars]
